title: [P2] Fresh TUI review pass
description: Run a focused review of TUI v2/render pipeline for regressions, UX issues, and correctness gaps; document findings and fixes.

logs.msg: Starting TUI review pass. review skill loaded; subagent Task tool unavailable in this runtime, proceeding with direct multi-file review + static checks.
Finding: unreachable match arm in src/tui/session/update.rs after event enum changes; fixed by removing dead fallback arm.
Validation: cargo clippy clean for this area (remaining warnings are non-TUI test nits outside this change), cargo test passed.
